data.description:
In Bocce Time! you'll head down to a peaceful park or atmospheric pier to test your bocce skills across 12 distinct courts. Jump into a quick match to 1v1 a random opponent online, create and join private rooms with up to 8 players, or play against AI across 3 difficulties to unlock additional ball customization options. With full cross-play, everyone's invited to join the fun! It's Bocce Time! 

Bocce ball is an ancient and simple game about getting your balls closest to the target. Players throw out a small ball called a pallino and then up to 4 teams take turns trying to get their balls closest to it, blocking, knocking, and blasting each others' balls in the process.

The pallino can land anywhere in bounds and every ball can impact the others, resulting in an ever shifting playing field where the target can change with every throw. It's easy to learn, but difficult to master, and when millimeters can make the difference between defeat and victory, individual skill really shines!

changelog.change_log: Added support for up to 4 teams. Added match settings such as bonus points for ending a round in contact with the pallino, changing how turn order is handled, and the ability to disable bounds enforcement--allowing players to throw from anywhere and everything to be considered in bounds. Changed the half pipe ramp to allow balls to roll under the central beam.
Expanded multiplayer support up to 8 players. Improved discord/quick match functionality.

Player avatars have been added and the UI has been overhauled to allow for multiple new options and community management. Some small physics changes and a change to the propeller court have also been made. Made it easier to apply backspin. Changed the way some collisions are handled.  Corrected a bug that prevented the ball from changing when stepping over the foul line.

Made some subtle changes to the propeller court on Serafin Pier. The crossbar under the table is now gone and the table has been made slightly shorter and narrower.

Added a second park, Serafin Pier with new courts and unlockable balls. Improved the physics in many ways. Gave Botty a makeover and generally improved his AI. Changed player voice audio to no longer scale volume with distance. Other miscellaneous tweaks and fixes.

You can now enter queue for a quick match and play against the AI while you wait! Also made some tweaks to notifications and certain visual effects not syncing up sporadically.

Improved Botty's AI to make him significantly less likely to throw the ball out of bounds, especially on higher difficulties. Improved the functionality of moving to/from the pallino and fixed a small bug that could declare the wrong team the winner if both teams were over the max score.

Added an option to change the default max score in the main settings. Added a max score indicator to the scoreboard. Fixed some small bugs. Changed the nearest ball indicator when a round ends to always show the distance to the loser's nearest ball.
Updated the controller diagrams to reflect one handed mode and swapped throw button settings. Added the controller diagram/gameplay rules to the menu area while in game.
